Fundraising

You know you can advance your mission and achieve your goals only by maintaining you financial stability. And that stability stands or falls on fundraising. Take advantage of Orr Group's business mindset and our wide-ranging expertise. We can support all fundraising initiatives, including major gifts, corporate partnerships and foundation relationships, and event strategy and management.

@@title

Orr Group's Campaign services include:

  • Fundraising Leadership
  • Pipeline Development
  • Major Gifts
  • Moves Management
  • Corporate Partnerships
  • Event Fundraising & Production
  • Institutional Giving
  • Systems Implementation & Database Management
